website_summaries.verdict: Intuit TurboTax Premier 2005 is the best ease-of-use choice for filers with complex returns. If you have investment, rental, and small-business income--and you hate paying usurious accountant fees--buy this program.
pros: Intuit TurboTax 2005 provides an easy-to-understand tax interview
includes TurboTax ItsDeductible for itemizing noncash charitable contributions
cons: TurboTax 2005 offers no free IRS audit support

customer_reviews.title: Product would work fine, until an update is requested by the user ...
customer_reviews.text: There was no longer updates available for this product from Intuit, the last update was on year 2010. Product would work fine, until an update is requested by the user or the program. However the program still workable even on a windows 10 platform.
customer_reviews.author: Puente Silva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, simple, fast
customer_reviews.text: I always use Turbotax. It's so straight forward, they listen to users over the year and improve it constantly. Wish it would stop hounding me to buy other addons...that is why I got this version, to avoid all the extras I don't want. So stop trying to sell me!
customer_reviews.author: M. Holt

customer_reviews.title: poor mac product
customer_reviews.text: constant problems with updates and mistakes. I have been using tax software since the early 90s and this is BY FAR the most problems I have ever had! Next yr I will use a mac only product. I had to send an ammended return too! Software chose my standard deduction over my itemized and I had to refile to get my full refund. Mac n tax was great. This company doesnt care if they get the mac market or not so I choose NOT!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Turbo tax deluxe
customer_reviews.text: I have used Trubo Tax Deluxe for several years. Each year it is better than it was the previous year. It is easy to understand and use. It is better than some of the "Tax Professionals" I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as last year's version
customer_reviews.text: I've used this software for several years-I didn't feel it was quite as good as last year. The interview did not seem as extensive as before. I do like the fact that it transfers some information from the previous year (if still in your hard drive.). However, It still is much better than another competetive program.
customer_reviews.author: R. MC DOWELL

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past. It works quite well and is easy enough for most anyone to use.
customer_reviews.author: SueS

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I used TurboTax for more than 6 years, but this is the last time. I could not import last year's return and could get no assistance to expain why last years information could not be transferred. Only my name transferred, but nothing else. Last year everying went great--what happenned? This is worse than an old Turbo Tax basic that I used several years ago. The Quicken import feature was a disaster. My dependents, and all other information had to be rekeyed. This combined with no rebate, difficulty getting the state return piece and updates that were not current--never again.
customer_reviews.author: Rose S

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than TaxCut, but more expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This year I tried to save some money switching to TaxCut. Big mistake, it completely missed some deductions. HSA account, vehicle registration, and sales tax deduction for washington state! I got frustrated and went back and bought TurboTax Deluxe which achieved everything I needed. Of course the price of the software and e-filing is a bit high. But I feel more confident about my return and can sleep better tonight.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bockorick

customer_reviews.title: Dreaded Tax Preparation Made Simple
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Turbo Tax software for many years and it gets easier to use every year. I will continue to prepare my own taxes using this software.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M

customer_reviews.title: Bad on rental income
customer_reviews.text: Won't let you choose your depreciation life or to depreciate two separate assets within one rental property (e.g. office building and office equipment). TaxCut does. But TurboTax supports foreign earned income - TaxCut doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The software takes away choice (Big pushy company??)
customer_reviews.text: The software FORCES you to go online and get the latest that they want you to have ... any company that takes away choice is in my opinion not a good company. This would have been my third year using Turbo Tax. I am now a very happy TaxCut (H&R Block) user ... and this new program even has the ability to convert Turbo Tax info. so that I didn't have to re-enter basic info.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Segraves

customer_reviews.title: OK mostly
customer_reviews.text: The product was OK; I hadn't used it in a number of years. Amortizing mortgage loan points as a deduction item did not work out. The message said it would calc it but never asked for the original loan amount to spread the points against; so there was a missed deduction. Helpful on the capital gains section which is confusing in the federal manual posting.
customer_reviews.author: Tony F. Srsen

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax is A OK
customer_reviews.text: purschased TurboTax and everything when really smooth, each year it gets better and better.... its a big help with the deductions....
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax is the greatest!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Turbo Tax to prepare my Federal Income Tax for several years. It is user friendly and helps me send a perfect Tax Return> Amazon had the best price available! I couldn't do without it each year.
customer_reviews.author: Harold L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Amazon has lousy customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product, but had the most awful time actually paying for it! I had a gift certificate which Amazon refused to honor! The product was fine and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why pay for State Return
customer_reviews.text: This version of TurboTax does not include the State Return portion of the program. If you live in a state without state income tax, this one is for you. It's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: soft ware purchase
customer_reviews.text: very fast turn a round bought used software very good condition. 5 stars to shipper, 4 stars to the turbo tax
customer_reviews.author: waltzin grandpa

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax Deluxe No State 2005 Win/Mac
customer_reviews.text: Intelligent design, easy to use, fast, reasonably priced. Will continue to buy every year.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolfen

product_meta.title: TurboTax Deluxe No State 2005 Win/Mac [Old Version]
product_meta.description: TurboTax Deluxe guides you with extra help for deductions. Finds hidden deductions—such as education and medical expenses. Gives you easy-to-understand deduction advice and tips from official IRS publications and expert videos. Now includes ItsDeductible software to help you accurately value donated items (for a bigger deduction!). Double-checks your return for errors, and even flags potential audit risks.
feature_bullets: Make changes more easily - navigate to any point in your return with a single click, then instantly return to where you left off
Find overlooked deductions - Get extra help for education, medical, home deductions, credits and more
Know exactly with items could flag an audit - and how to avoid them
Save time with e-File -- Your refund can be deposited directly into your account
Get access to official IRS publications -- authoritative information straight from the source

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
